mapper.select: SELECT LF_NO, LF_CURRI_ORIGINAFILE, LF_CURRI_STOREDFILE, LF_COVER_ORIGINALFILE, LF_COVER_STOREDFILE, LF_STUDY_ORIGINALFILE, LF_STUDY_STOREDFILE FROM L_OPEN_FILE WHERE L_NO=#{L_NO}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO L_OPEN_FILE ( LF_NO, L_NO, LF_CURRI_ORIGINAFILE, LF_CURRI_STOREDFILE, LF_COVER_ORIGINALFILE, LF_COVER_STOREDFILE, LF_STUDY_ORIGINALFILE, LF_STUDY_STOREDFILE ) VALUES ( LF_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{L_NO}, #{LF_CURRI_ORIGINALFILE}, #{LF_CURRI_STOREDFILE}, #{LF_COVER_ORIGINALFILE}, #{LF_COVER_STOREDFILE}, #{LF_STUDY_ORIGINALFILE}, #{LF_STUDY_STOREDFILE} )
mapper.update: UPDATE L_OPEN_FILE SET LF_CURRI_ORIGINAFILE=#{LF_CURRI_ORIGINAFILE}, LF_CURRI_STOREDFILE=#{LF_CURRI_ORIGINAFILE}, LF_COVER_ORIGINALFILE=#{LF_COVER_ORIGINALFILE}, LF_COVER_STOREDFILE=#{LF_COVER_STOREDFILE}, LF_STUDY_ORIGINALFILE=#{LF_STUDY_ORIGINALFILE}, LF_STUDY_STOREDFILE=#{LF_STUDY_STOREDFILE} WHERE LF_NO=#{LF_NO} AND L_NO=#{L_NO}
